name: Super bread boy (WIP)
description:
Run jump and platform in this 2d platformer, based around a piece of bread avoiding pizza cutters in a kitchen.

There are 4 levels, with nothing after you get to the end of the fourth level

to beat the level, just go through the path. even though theres nothing there, once you reach the end you will be taken to the next level.

Music credits - FinalGateStudios
